ack.p: This work has been funded by the NERC/DFID Future Climate For Africa programme under the AMMA-2050 project, grant number NE/M020126/1. MG was also supported by the LABEX (Laboratoire d'Excellence) L-IPSL (LABEX of the IPSL), which was funded by the French Agence Nationale de la Recherche under Programme Investissements d'Avenir Grant ANR-10-LABX-18-01.
